text: Early is a former community in Sherman County, Oregon, United States. It was founded in 1902, with a post office established at this time. The post office was discontinued in 1919. In the 20th century, a flour mill operated in the town. It is contemporarily considered a ghost town. ==References== Category:1902 establishments in Oregon Category:Populated places established in 1902 Category:Former populated places in Sherman County, Oregon Category:Ghost towns in Oregon Category:Unincorporated communities in Sherman County, Oregon
title: Early, Oregon
